hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: "When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) put on a Qamis he began with the right side. [Abu 'Eisa said:] Others have reported this Hadith from Shu'bah with this chain, but they dod narrate it in Marfu' form, only 'Abdus-Samad narrated it Marfu

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Shirts
